body: These goggles feature stubby periscopelike lenses that expand and retract depending on the needs of the wearer. These goggles function as sniper goggles, but the wearer gains the +2 circumstance bonus on each sneak attack when making a sneak attack at any range.
name: Sniper Goggles, Greater
